title: Jacksonville Landing shooting
content: The Jacksonville Landing shooting, also known as the Jacksonville shooting,[6][7][8] was a mass shooting that occurred at a video game tournament for the video game Madden NFL 19 in Jacksonville Landing, Jacksonville, Florida, on August 26, 2018, at about 1:30 pm (EDT). A lone gunman, David Katz, shot and killed two people and injured another ten before killing himself.[1][4]
